Package com.independentid.scim.client

Class i2scimClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.independentid.scim.client.i2scimClient
  • public class i2scimClient
extends java.lang.Object
    i2scimClient is a general utility class using the Apache HTTP Client to call a SCIM Server. When instantiated, a CloseableHttpClient is created and a test call is made to the SCIM "/ServiceProviderConfig" endpoint to discover remote capabilities. Where possible, the local client will throw an error if a feature is not available as indicated by the ServiceProviderConfig.

    • Constructor Detail

      • i2scimClient

        public i2scimClient​(java.lang.String serverRootUrl,
                    java.lang.String authorization)
             throws ScimException,
                    java.io.IOException,
                    java.net.URISyntaxException
        This constructor establishes a SCIM client using an authorization header value (e.g. Bearer token). The client will contact the server and auto-load the remote schema for use locally. The client will also query the SCIM /ServiceProviderConfig endpoint. THe client then records the server's capabilities for enforcement later if desired. This can be disabled with setIgnoreServiceProviderConfig(boolean).
        Parameters:
        serverRootUrl - The URL of the SCIM server root to contact.
        authorization - The authorization header value to use
        Throws:
        ScimException - when an SCIM protocol error occurs
        java.io.IOException - due to connection issues
        java.net.URISyntaxException - due to an invalid serverRootUrl

      • i2scimClient

        public i2scimClient​(java.lang.String serverRootUrl,
                    org.apache.http.auth.UsernamePasswordCredentials cred)
             throws ScimException,
                    java.io.IOException,
                    java.net.URISyntaxException
        This constructor establishes a SCIM client using Basic Auth. The client will contact the server and auto-load the remote schema for use locally. The client will also query the SCIM /ServiceProviderConfig endpoint. THe client then records the server's capabilities for enforcement later if desired. This can be disabled with setIgnoreServiceProviderConfig(boolean).
        Parameters:
        serverRootUrl - The URL of the SCIM server root to contact.
        cred - A UsernamePasswordCredentials credential containing a username and password
        Throws:
        ScimException - when an SCIM protocol error occurs
        java.io.IOException - due to connection issues
        java.net.URISyntaxException - due to an invalid serverRootUrl

      • i2scimClient

        public i2scimClient​(SchemaManager schemaManager)
        This constructor is used only when wanting to use i2ScimClient for access to builders (aka Schema only mode).
        Parameters:
        schemaManager - A SchemaManager instance

      • i2scimClient

        public i2scimClient​(java.lang.String serverRootUrl,
                    java.lang.String authorization,
                    java.lang.String schemaPath,
                    java.lang.String resourceTypesPath)
             throws ScimException,
                    java.io.IOException,
                    java.net.URISyntaxException
        Instantiates an i2scim client context. When instantiated, the client will load schema locally and will check connectivity with the service provider by querying the SCIM /ServiceProviderConfig endpoint. THe client then records the server's capabilities for enforcement later if desired. This can be disabled with setIgnoreServiceProviderConfig(boolean).
        Parameters:
        serverRootUrl - A URL representing the root of the server to be contacted
        authorization - A String constituting the authorization header value for requests
        schemaPath - A local file path for a SCIM schema JSON file (what schemas are defined). If NULL, schema and resource types will be loaded from service provider.
        resourceTypesPath - A local file path for a SCIM Resource Types JSON file or NULL.
        Throws:
        ScimException - when an SCIM protocol error occurs
        java.io.IOException - due to connection issues
        java.net.URISyntaxException - due to an invalid serverRootUrl

    • Method Detail

      • isSchemaMode

        public boolean isSchemaMode()
        Returns:
        True if client is configured to run in Schema only mode and not configured for Http requests.

      • setAuthorization

        public void setAuthorization​(java.lang.String authz)

        Parameters:

      • setAuthorization

        public void setAuthorization​(org.apache.http.auth.UsernamePasswordCredentials cred)
        Changes the security authorization used by the client using Basic Authentication
        Parameters:
        cred - A UsernamePasswordCredentials object containing a username and password

      • setIgnoreServiceProviderConfig

        public void setIgnoreServiceProviderConfig​(boolean ignore)
        Normally the i2scimClient will interrogate the ServiceProviderConfig feature support of remote server and issue exceptions when requests include a feature not supported by the service provider. This method can be used to override enforcement and send requests anyway. This may be used for testing or when ServiceProviderConfig endpoint cannot be processed properly.
        Parameters:
        ignore - Set to true if requests should always be tried. Default: false)

      • hasSearchSupport

        public boolean hasSearchSupport()
        Returns:
        true if the connected SCIM endpoint supports search filters.

      • hasNoEtagSupport

        public boolean hasNoEtagSupport()
        Returns:
        true if the connected SCIM endpoint does NOT support pre-conditions and etags

      • hasPatchSupport

        public boolean hasPatchSupport()
        Returns:
        true if the connected SCIM server supports HTTP PATCH

        Returns:
        true if the connected SCIM server supports sorting results.

      • hasChangePasswordSupport

        public boolean hasChangePasswordSupport()
        Returns:
        true if the connected SCIM server supports change password

        public ResourceBuilder getResourceBuilder​(java.lang.String container)
        Returns a new resource builder for the specified path. The builder is used to generate a new ScimResource object.
        Parameters:
        container - The SCIM container (top level path element without slashes). E.g. Users
        Returns:
        ScimResourceBuilder for the specified container/type

                                            throws SchemaException
        Creates a builder for ComplexValues (values that contain more than one attribute) using the complex attribute name.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - the name of the Complex attribute to be created. E.g. (User:name)
        Returns:
        A ComplexValue.Builder object
        Throws:
        SchemaException - is thrown if the attribute name is not found or is not a Complex Attribute.

      • getMultiValueBuilder

        public MultiValue.Builder getMultiValueBuilder​(java.lang.String attributeName)
                                        throws SchemaException
        Creates a builder for MultiValue objects (values that contain more than one Value) using the attribute name.
        Parameters:
        attributeName - the name of the Multi-value attribute to be created. E.g. (Group:member). Note: if using ScimResource.addValue(Value) method, you may add a row value (e.g. ComplexValue, StringValue) directly rather than wrapping in a MultiValue container.
        Returns:
        A ComplexValue.Builder object
        Throws:
        SchemaException - is thrown if the attribute name is not found or is not a multi-valued attribute.

      • getPatchRequestBuilder

        public JsonPatchBuilder getPatchRequestBuilder()
        Returns a SCIM Patch request builder. This method is used to construct a JsonPatchRequest used in conjunction with a SCIM PATCH operation.
        Returns:
        A JsonPatchBuilder object enabling construction of a SCIM Patch request using builder pattern

      • authenticateUser

        public boolean authenticateUser​(org.apache.http.auth.UsernamePasswordCredentials cred)
                         throws ScimException,
                                java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                java.io.IOException,
                                java.text.ParseException
        Validates a username password combination against a SCIM service provider by converting to a GET request with filter. This does not change the underlying SCIM client credential used for requests. The ability to validate this request (a search against password) must be configured in the service provider access control.
        Parameters:
        cred - The username password combination to be validated
        Returns:
        true if authenticated, false if no match.
        Throws:
        ScimException - when an SCIM protocol error occurs. May throw unauthorized if the underlying authorization does not have the right to perform the query.
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when an invalid request URL is provided
        java.text.ParseException - when a response is not formatted correctly
        java.io.IOException - due to connection issues

      • get

        public i2scimResponse get​(java.lang.String path,
                          ScimReqParams params)
                   throws ScimException,
                          java.net.URISyntaxException,
                          java.io.IOException,
                          java.text.ParseException
        Retrieves the specified resource at the given path. The path must specify a single return object. Filters are NOT supported on this method per RFC7644 indicating any request with a filter must return a List.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to a SCIM resource that returns a single object
        params - Scim request params ScimReqParams (attributes requested, etc)
        Returns:
        A i2scimResponse containing the object or objects or appropriate SCIM error
        Throws:
        ScimException - when a parsing error occurs parsing the results of a response. SCIM protocol errors will be contained in i2scimResponse
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when an invalid request URL is provided
        java.text.ParseException - when a response is not formatted correctly
        java.io.IOException - due to connection issues

      • retrieveAndBuild

        public ResourceBuilder retrieveAndBuild​(java.lang.String path,
                                        ScimReqParams params)
                                 throws ScimException,
                                        java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                        java.io.IOException,
                                        java.text.ParseException
        Retrieves the specified resource at the given path and returns a builder. The path must specify a single return object. Filters are NOT supported on this method per RFC7644 indicating any request with a filter must return a List.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to a SCIM resource that returns a single object
        params - Scim request params ScimReqParams (attributes requested, etc)
        Returns:
        a ResourceBuilder object
        Throws:
        ScimException - when an SCIM protocol error occurs such as NotFoundException
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when an invalid request URL is provided
        java.text.ParseException - when a response is not formatted correctly
        java.io.IOException - due to connection issues

      • searchGet

        public i2scimResponse searchGet​(java.lang.String path,
                                java.lang.String filter,
                                ScimReqParams params)
                         throws ScimException,
                                java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                java.io.IOException,
                                java.text.ParseException
        searchGet performs a search to return one or more objects in a SCIM ListResponse. This method invokes the HTTP GET version of the SCIM Protocol See RFC7644 Sec 3.4.2. Caution: avoid passing sensitive information in filters as they may appear in access logs.
        Parameters:
        path - A path within the SCIM server to search. It may be the root "/", a containers (e.g. "/Users") or a specific resource.
        filter - A SCIM filter see RFC7644 Sec 3.4.2.2
        params - Scim request params ScimReqParams (attributes requested, etc)
        Returns:
        A i2scimResponse containing the object or objects or appropriate SCIM error
        Throws:
        ScimException - when a parsing error occurs parsing the results of a response. SCIM protocol errors will be contained in i2scimResponse
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when an invalid request URL is provided
        java.text.ParseException - when a response is not formatted correctly
        java.io.IOException - due to connection issues

      • searchPost

        public i2scimResponse searchPost​(java.lang.String path,
                                 java.lang.String filter,
                                 ScimReqParams params)
                          throws ScimException,
                                 java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                 java.io.IOException,
                                 java.text.ParseException
        searchPost performs a search to return one or more objects in a SCIM ListResponse. This method invokes the HTTP POST query version of the SCIM Protocol RFC7644 Sec 3.4.3. This method may be used to enable passing confidential information in filters.
        Parameters:
        path - A path within the SCIM server to search. It may be the root "/", a containers (e.g. "/Users") or a specific resource.
        filter - A SCIM filter RFC7644 Sec 3.4.2.2
        params - Scim request params ScimReqParams (attributes requested, etc)
        Returns:
        A i2scimResponse containing the object or objects or appropriate SCIM error
        Throws:
        ScimException - when a parsing error occurs parsing the results of a response. SCIM protocol errors will be contained in i2scimResponse
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when an invalid request URL is provided
        java.text.ParseException - when a response is not formatted correctly
        java.io.IOException - due to connection issues

      • create

        public i2scimResponse create​(ScimResource res,
                             ScimReqParams params)
                      throws ScimException,
                             java.net.URISyntaxException,
                             java.io.IOException,
                             java.text.ParseException
        This method creates a SCIM Resource using the HTTP POST command. The URI for the request is constructed from the ScimResource.
        Parameters:
        res - The ScimResource to be created on the service provider. If the resource includes an "id" the service provider will usually ignore it.
        params - Optional SCIM request modifiers (e.g. attributes)
        Returns:
        A i2scimResponse containing the object response or appropriate SCIM error
        Throws:
        ScimException - when a parsing error occurs parsing the results of a response. SCIM protocol errors will be contained in i2scimResponse
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when an invalid request URL is provided
        java.text.ParseException - when a response is not formatted correctly
        java.io.IOException - due to connection issues

                          ScimReqParams params)
                   throws ScimException,
                          java.net.URISyntaxException,
                          java.io.IOException,
                          java.text.ParseException
        This method performs a SCIM PUT request. The URI for the request is constructed from the ScimResource.
        Parameters:
        res - The ScimResource to be replaced on the service provider
        params - Optional SCIM request modifiers (e.g. attributes)
        Returns:
        A i2scimResponse containing the object response or appropriate SCIM error
        Throws:
        ScimException - when a parsing error occurs parsing the results of a response. SCIM protocol errors will be contained in i2scimResponse
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when an invalid request URL is provided
        java.text.ParseException - when a response is not formatted correctly
        java.io.IOException - due to connection issues

      • patch

        public i2scimResponse patch​(java.lang.String path,
                            JsonPatchRequest req,
                            ScimReqParams params)
                     throws ScimException,
                            java.net.URISyntaxException,
                            java.io.IOException,
                            java.text.ParseException
        Performs a SCIM PATCH request against a specified resource as per RFC7644 Sec 3.5.2
        Parameters:
        path - The relative path of the object to be modified
        req - A JsonPatchRequest containing one or more JsonPatchOp operations.
        params - Optional SCIM request parameters or NULL
        Returns:
        A i2scimResponse containing the object response or appropriate SCIM error
        Throws:
        ScimException - when a parsing error occurs parsing the results of a response. SCIM protocol errors will be contained in i2scimResponse
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when an invalid request URL is provided
        java.text.ParseException - when a response is not formatted correctly
        java.io.IOException - due to connection issues

      • headInfo

        public i2scimResponse headInfo​(java.lang.String path,
                               ScimReqParams params)
                        throws ScimException,
                               java.io.IOException,
                               java.net.URISyntaxException,
                               java.text.ParseException
        Performs an HTTP HEAD request of the resource specified by path. Similar to SCIM GET but without returning the resource.
        Parameters:
        path - The relative path of the object to be checked.
        params - Scim Request containing optional pre-conditions for the request
        Returns:
        A i2scimResponse containing the object response or appropriate SCIM error
        Throws:
        ScimException - when a parsing error occurs parsing the results of a response. SCIM protocol errors will be contained in i2scimResponse
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when an invalid request URL is provided
        java.text.ParseException - when a response is not formatted correctly
        java.io.IOException - due to connection issues

      • execute

        public org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse execute​(org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpUriRequest req)
                                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Executes an HTTP Request using the embedded HTTP Client. Note this bypassed SCIM protocol validation and allows direct access to i2scimClient's CloseableHttpClient.
        Parameters:
        req - An Apache HttpUriRequest object to execute.
        Returns:
        A CloseableHttpResponse response object. Remember to call the close() method before performing another request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs communicating with the server.

      • getSchemaManager

        public SchemaManager getSchemaManager()
        Returns:
        The SchemaManager instance used by the i2scimClient. May be used to look up SCIM Schema and Attribute definitions.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the HTTP Client connection and cleans up (closes SchemaManager).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when closing CloseableHttpClient
